About Me

Down to Business

I have a wide variety of experiences that have cultivated a passion for design thinking, data-driven development, and doing the best work of my life every day.

A few of my key strengths.

User/Customer Experience Design

Customer/user-centric approach to every project I tackle, ensuring to focus on the business value combine with solving for the real problem. I seek to utilize the right combination of research, design thinking, and cross-team collaboration to narrow in on the right solution combine with the real problem.

Design/Research OPS

I seek to establish processes, guidelines, and systems of work without burden of bureaucracy. The right tools for the right projects. The right guidelines to ensure productivity while allowing for creativity. The right patterns for the most balanced and productive workforce. The right methods for sharing the research generated insights. My motto for Design/Research OPS is much like the Agile process itself, ship light and fast, and in the correct direction.

Team Leadership and Management

I've managed teams of UX Designers and Researchers. I've collaborated across multiple teams within a company, successfully building consensus, and a shared vision for CX/UX. I've got a passion for investing in my teammates and direct reports, with an emphasis on individual career support, mentoring, and utilizing their skills to the best effect for personal satisfaction and the corporate priorities.

Portfolio

The Wins from My Teams and I

Design Systems

As Director of User Experience and User Interface I oversaw and guided the development and launch of our companies first Design System. A robust, fully realized designs system build with the modern React Framework, it featured all of the standards which make for a world-class application development tool.

  • Fully developed documentation site with robust designer, tech-writer, and developer resources.
  • Duplicate designer resources for 1-to-1 mockup to application development.
  • Custom Iconic font for great market customization and iconography.
  • Accessibility for both the hearing and visually impaired.
  • Consistency UX/UI across the entire library.
  • i18N translation built in.
  • Atom component design
  • Light & dark theme.

Team Building

Efficiently managed a team of 5+ with varying disciplines, including Product Manager, User Experience Designer, and User Experience Researchers. Increased team satisfaction, engagement, and productivity through the implementation of workshops, team learning & growth sessions, critiques and various other ceremonies/processes. Oversaw the career growth for multiple direct reports and actively recruited top talent into the company.

E-Commerce Modernization & Consolidation

Worked across departments to overhaul, modernize, and reduced overhead for all customer facing web properties. Ultimately shifting from antiquated legacy technologies to modern applications structured and paradigms. The results of which were increased user engagement, unified brand aesthetic, streamlined customer support, enhanced marketing and increased sales.

Application Modernization & Development

Coordinated and actively participated in user experience driven upgrades to a 17-year old legacy application. Bringing modern design paradigms and best practice user experience research to update/modernize the application. This resulted in numerous upgrades which were highly regarded by the customer and user base, diving up satisfaction and engagement.
